```{r}
library(rjags)
library(coda)
library(KMsurv)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyverse)

data(larynx)

```

```{r}
K <- 3 
a <- seq(0, max(larynx$time) + 0.001, length.out = K + 1) #vector de tiempos de censura 
# int.obs: vector que nos dice en que intervalo cae cada observaciÃ³n
int.obs <- matrix(data = NA, nrow = nrow(larynx), ncol = length(a) - 1)
d <- matrix(data = NA, nrow = nrow(larynx), ncol = length(a) - 1) 
for(i in 1:nrow(larynx)){
  for (k in 1:(length(a) - 1)){
    d[i, k] <- ifelse(larynx$time[i] - a[k] > 0, 1, 0) * ifelse(a[k + 1] - larynx$time[i] > 0, 1, 0)
    int.obs[i, k] <- d[i, k] * k #
  }
}
(Int.obs <- rowSums(int.obs))
```
